title: whats riots wait time for tickets?
body: i submitted a ticket yesterday and haven't received a response its about a suspension and i was just wondering whats the wait time because i would like to get my account back.

replies.body: NA's typical response time is anywhere from about 10-13 hours usually. Have you gotten a response yet? If not, shoot me the ticket number and I can check up on it for ya.

Usually you receive an email saying that it takes 1-2 days. It should say to sit tight because other people are flooding the website with tickets as well. So it should take 1-2 days. If it's been past that then there might not be anything to do about it. But that doesn't usually happen, just check in every so often and be patient!
